exclusion.criterion: Allergy to contrast media or iodine
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Allergy or contraindication to antibiotic therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe systemic illness (for example malignancy, medical condition requiring immunosuppressant medication)

exclusion.criterion: Complicated acute appendicitis confirmed by CT scan

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma and a diverticular abscess, but is being treated with antibiotics.
